sentences.en: A uniformly congruent security model is presented based on observational congruence.
sentences.cn: 基于观察同余等价,构造了一类一致同余安全模型.

sentences.en: All of these are congruent triangles.
sentences.cn: 所有这些都是全等三角形.

sentences.en: Also Zaller talks a lot about messages that are congruent or discordant with people's underlying predispositions.
sentences.cn: Zaller还说了很多有关和人们的内在倾向是一致或矛盾的讯息.

sentences.en: And there are many areas of congruent interests.
sentences.cn: 而在其他诸多领域中,双方不乏和谐一致的利益.

sentences.en: Are the applicant s career aspirations congruent with that offered by the job?
sentences.cn: 求职者渴望得到的职业与所提供的工作相符 吗 ?

sentences.en: But not all practices are congruent.
sentences.cn: 但是不是所有的实践都是适合的.

sentences.en: Cube: a regular solid having six congruent square faces.
sentences.cn: 立方体: 一种通常有六个相等的正方形侧面的正立体.

sentences.en: Do Australia and China have congruent interests in this area?
sentences.cn: 澳大利亚和中国在这个领域是否有共同的利益?

sentences.en: If you want to succeed, you must be congruent.
sentences.cn: 如果你想成功, 你必须是一致的.

sentences.en: That keeps people from living in a congruent, integrated world.
sentences.cn: 这会让人们远离一致和统整的世界.

sentences.en: The diagonals of a ( an ) isosceles [ trapezoid, trapezoid, parallelogram ] are congruent.
sentences.cn: 等腰 梯形的对角线等长.

sentences.en: The original congruent number formula has been deduced by fundmental methods number theory.
sentences.cn: 通过运用初等数论方法,推导出本原同余数公式.

sentences.en: There exists two pairs of congruent plane pencils between two projective space.
sentences.cn: 两射影空间场,属于每一对对应非固有点,存在两对对应合同面束.

sentences.en: They want to work in an organization whose values are congruent with their own.
sentences.cn: 他们想在一家与他们自己的价值观相同的组织里工作。

sentences.en: This research mainly concerns the nature of mood congruent effects.
sentences.cn: 本研究旨在考察情绪一致性效应的本质特点及其影响因素.

sentences.en: Two triangles are congruent if they have two angles and the included side equal.
sentences.cn: 两个三角形如果有两个角及其夹边对应相等则它们全等.

words.tran_cn: [数]适合的，一致的；全等的；合谐的

trans.tran_cn: <数>叠合的， 全等的，符合的， 一致的
